summary: REQ-1 (replace the logo with exact text) appears implemented in HomeNavbar.tsx, but the diff shows additional, unrequested modifications beyond the selected element and changes to other files, violating the stated constraints.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified additional parts of HomeNavbar beyond replacing only the selected logo element (e.g., changed aria-label and added/changed surrounding container markup/classes).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraint: apply changes ONLY to the selected element (the logo ) and do not modify other navbar elements/behavior. Diff shows changes to the button aria-label and container structure/styling around the logo, not just swapping the node.
evidence: frontend/src/components/home/HomeNavbar.tsx (aria-label changed; logo container now contains <span> with text and fixed heights)

hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by BuildRequest; also violates the constraint to not modify other navbar elements/behavior and to keep changes limited to the selected element in HomeNavbar.tsx.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project_state.json to add new_feature_requests entries (AR-1/AR-2) and mark statuses pending.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by BuildRequest; unrelated to implementing REQ-1 in the specified component file.
